project_plan.name: Python Multiple-Choice Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions, keeps track of scores, and displays the final score at the end.

task.name: Define questions and answers to be included in the quiz
Implement functionality to display questions and capture user input
Implement score tracking based on user responses
Implement functionality to display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests to ensure the quiz functionality works as expected
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure all features function correctly
